title: Yield compression triggers 50% TVL drop in USDe despite rising onchain usage
contentSnippet: The sharp TVL contraction appears largely driven by the unwinding of leveraged looping strategies that proliferated across DeFi protocols.

title: Lighter CEO on ‘democratizing finance’ with a zero-fee, ZK perp DEX
contentSnippet: CEO Vladimir Novakovski explains the infrastructure powering the perp DEX, and why Lighter opted for a zero-fee structure for retail users.

title: Saudi Arabia's First Quantum Computer: Can It Break Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: Saudi Arabia has deployed its first quantum computer, renewing questions about the future of blockchain security.

title: Texas reportedly kicks off state bitcoin reserve with $5 million IBIT purchase: ‘More wild stuff’
contentSnippet: A $10M budget allocation for BTC was approved with the reported $5M trade representing the first step toward deploying those funds.

title: Monad Rises After Airdrop While Bitcoin and Ethereum Droop
contentSnippet: The price of Monad’s native cryptocurrency rose on Tuesday, following an anticipated airdrop that initially underwhelmed some speculators.

title: Bitwise Dogecoin ETF Debut Imminent After Quiet Start for Grayscale DOGE Fund
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Dogecoin ETF, BWOW, was certified by NYSE Arca, signaling investors will soon be able to start trading the meme coin fund.

title: Kevin Hassett, who has crypto ties, rises to the front in Fed Chair search: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Kevin Hassett is at the top of the leaderboard to become the next Fed Chair, according to reporting from Bloomberg.

title: Layer 1 blockchain SKALE taps Layer 2 Base for AI-focused Layer 3
contentSnippet: SKALE on Base allows agents to take advantage of the chain's scalable infrastructure and Base’s liquidity, users, onramps, and distribution.

title: Texas Buys $5M in BTC ETF as States Edge Toward First Government Crypto Reserves
contentSnippet: The effort is starting small, but Texas made an opening foray into a state-based crypto reserve — getting closer to the first government stockpile in the U.S.

title: US Bank Is Testing a Stablecoin on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: U.S. Bank joins the growing list of traditional banking institutions working on stablecoins, testing its own on the Stellar blockchain.

title: MoonPay Granted New York Trust Charter, Joining Coinbase and Ripple
contentSnippet: Crypto payments firm MoonPay has gained regulatory approval in New York to safeguard customers’ digital assets and facilitate OTC trades.

title: CFTC Acting Chair Pham seeks CEOs for innovation council amid expanding crypto oversight
contentSnippet: The CFTC's Acting Chair, Caroline Pham, is seeking chief executives to bolster a newly formed CEO Innovation Council.

title: Kraken Launches Bitcoin Rewards Debit Mastercard Ahead of Planned IPO
contentSnippet: Kraken unveiled a Bitcoin rewards Mastercard debit card that links to its peer-to-peer payments app, Krak.

title: America’s fifth-largest bank US Bancorp tests stablecoin on Stellar
contentSnippet: The bank's push into stablecoins puts it among many other traditional financial institutions, like Bank of America and Citi.

title: The Daily: Polymarket allowed to resume US operations, Grayscale and Franklin XRP ETFs each clock over $60M in debut inflows, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Polymarket Set for US Return Following Approval From CFTC
contentSnippet: The popular prediction market says it now has permission to directly onboard U.S. customers, brokerages, and market intermediaries.

title: Tether-pegged USDT0 omnichain stablecoin passes $50 billion in cumulative transfers
contentSnippet: USDT0 launched in January using LayerZero's Omnichain Fungible Token standard, enabling it to extend to 15 blockchains.

title: JPMorgan Chase shuts ShapeShift employee’s business account, says his personal account will be next
contentSnippet: ShapeShift’s Houston Morgan told The Block that JPMorgan Chase abruptly closed his business bank account last Friday.

title: Stellar Rallies 2.3% Breaking Key Resistance on Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Stellar breaks through critical $0.2460 level as institutional flows drive measured accumulation above seven-day averages.

title: Metaplanet Reveals Yet Another Move to Add to $2.7 Billion Bitcoin Stash, Taking $130M Loan
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury Metaplanet has announced a new plan to buy more BTC: Use its holdings as collateral to take a $130 million loan.

title: U.S. Crypto Regulator, CFTC, Seeking Names for New 'CEO Innovation Council'
contentSnippet: Acting Chairman Caroline Pham said the group will help usher in a new era of market structure, including a focus on digital assets.

title: Filecoin Spikes 9% as Downtrend Breaks
contentSnippet: The strong price action occurred on below-average volume.

title: U.S Bank Tests Custom Stablecoin Issuance on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: The nation's fifth-largest commercial bank explores how a bank can issue stablecoins on a public blockchain.

title: Is the Bull Market over? The AI Manhattan Project! Monad Launch Reaction!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors rallied alongside a broad market surge, with BTC up 2% to $87,400, ETH up 4% to $2,920, BNB up 1% to $850, and SOL up 5% to $136, while KAS (+22%), ENA (+13%), and SUI (+11%) led the day

title: TON Pulls Back After Ecosystem-Driven Rally as Traders Eye Key Support Near $1.50
contentSnippet: The token's price action points to fading buyer interest, with initial strong trading activity giving way to a sharp decline in participation.

title: Oct. 7 Hamas Attack Victims Sue Binance for Damages
contentSnippet: Binance allegedly facilitated the transfer of over $1 billion to sanctioned entities including Hamas and Iran's Revolutionary Guard Corps, a lawsuit said.

title: Anthropic Completes AI Model Upgrades With Claude Opus 4.5—And Slashes Prices
contentSnippet: Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.5, completing its three-model lineup upgrade with benchmark-topping coding performance and a dramatic 67% price cut.

title: ICP Clears Key Technical Barrier as Breakout Volume Confirms Upward Momentum
contentSnippet: Internet Computer climbed through the crucial $4.20 resistance level on elevated volume before late-session consolidation narrowed gains.

title: BONK Breaks Through Overhead Resistance as Volume Jumps 85% Above Average
contentSnippet: Increased trading volume carried BONK through a major resistance threshold before late pullbacks shaped a new support band.

title: Why Bitcoin Is Underperforming Equities Despite Bullish Catalysts
contentSnippet: Gains in AI-fueled stocks and heavy crypto leverage have widened the gap between bitcoin and equities.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
